abstract: Hewlett-Packard has agreed to a financial settlement with The New York Times and three Business Week magazine journalists in connection with the company’s spying scandal.
snippet: Hewlett-Packard has agreed to a financial settlement with The New York Times and three Business Week magazine journalists in connection with the company’s spying scandal.
lead_paragraph: SAN FRANCISCO  Hewlett-Packard has agreed to a financial settlement with The New York Times and three BusinessWeek magazine journalists in connection with the company’s spying scandal that stemmed from surreptitiously obtaining private phone records.

headline.print_headline: H.P. Agrees to Settle Journalist Spy Case
